Key Match Events: Wales lost a penalty shootout 5-4 against Poland following a goalless draw.
Daniel James had his penalty saved in the bottom left corner.
Pre-Game Insights: There were no pre-game insights provided in the article.
Post-Match Reflections: Wales manager reflected on Euro 2024 qualifying exit, calling it 'a horrible way to go out'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Cardiff City Stadium in Cardiff, Wales, with an attendance of 31,876.
The match ended in a penalty shootout after a goalless draw.
Others: The match was part of the 2024 European Championship Qualifying, Playoff - Final.
